original: @165a # // rgya gar skad du /🔽svapna tsinta ma ni pa ri ka th'a /
analyzed: @165a # // rgya gar skad du / svapna tsinta ma ni pa ri ka th'a /
translated: In Sanskrit:🔽Svapnacintāmaṇiparikathā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu'i gtam /
analyzed: rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu'i gtam /
translated: The Discourse on the Wish-Fulfilling Gem of Dreams

original: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!

original: gang zhig rtogs pa'i phyir na rmi lam mthar //
analyzed: gang zhig rtogs pa'i phyir na rmi lam mthar //
translated: For the sake of realizing that dreams are ultimately

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams las rigs rnyed de //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams las rigs rnyed de //
translated: Bodhisattvas find their family,

original: phan phyir sems can dga' ba 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: phan phyir sems can dga' ba 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: And for the sake of others, some

original: skye dgu rnams la 'doms par byed pa yin //
analyzed: skye dgu rnams la 'doms par byed pa yin //
translated: Give advice to beings.

original: bdag dang sems can thams cad bde sdug mtshungs //
analyzed: bdag dang sems can thams cad bde sdug mtshungs //
translated: Myself and all sentient beings are equal in happiness and suffering.

original: bde sdug mtshungs pa can ni gnyen yin na //
analyzed: bde sdug mtshungs pa can ni gnyen yin na //
translated: Those who are equal in happiness and suffering are relatives.

original: bdag gis de dag rab tu spangs nas kyang //
analyzed: bdag gis de dag rab tu spangs nas kyang //
translated: Having completely abandoned them,

original: mya ngan 'das par 'jug pa mi rigs so //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das par 'jug pa mi rigs so //
translated: It is not right for me to enter nirvana.

original: skye bo 'di dag dang ni lhan cig tu //
analyzed: skye bo 'di dag dang ni lhan cig tu //
translated: Together with these beings,🔽I have experienced intense suffering in the lower realms,

original: ngan song dag tu sdug bsngal drag po dang // bde 'gro dag tu 'ang bde ba mang po myong//
analyzed: ngan song dag tu sdug bsngal drag po dang // bde 'gro dag tu 'ang bde ba mang po myong//
translated: And also much happiness in the higher realms.

original: @165b gcig tu gnas pas bdag la 'di dag dga' //
analyzed: @165b gcig tu gnas pas bdag la 'di dag dga' //
translated: They delight in me, who remains alone.

original: gang gi mngal du lan cig min par bdag / ma gnas pa'am bdag la gang ma gnas //
analyzed: gang gi mngal du lan cig min par bdag / ma gnas pa'am bdag la gang ma gnas //
translated: Who did not carry me in her womb, or whom I did not carry in my womb,

original: sems can de na 'di ni gang yang med //
analyzed: sems can de na 'di ni gang yang med //
translated: there is no sentient being who is not my close relation.

original: de'i phyir thams cad gnyen du gyur pa yin //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad gnyen du gyur pa yin //
translated: Therefore, all are my close relatives.

original: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag dga' ste ;
analyzed: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das la bdag dga' ste ;
translated: Moreover, I delight in the Blessed One,

original: / gang phyir 'di dag ched du bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: / gang phyir 'di dag ched du bcom ldan 'das //
translated: because of these, the Blessed One,

original: shin tu yun ring bar ni skyo gyur na //
analyzed: shin tu yun ring bar ni skyo gyur na //
translated: having become weary for a very long time,

original: des kyang bdag ni sems can rnams la dga' //
analyzed: des kyang bdag ni sems can rnams la dga' //
translated: I too delight in sentient beings.

original: 'di ltar phan dang gnod pa byas pa las //
analyzed: 'di ltar phan dang gnod pa byas pa las //
translated: Thus, from the act of benefiting or harming,

original: bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal tshad med pa //
analyzed: bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal tshad med pa //
translated: immeasurable happiness and suffering

original: gnyis ka'i rgyu ru 'gyur ba de phyir yad //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i rgyu ru 'gyur ba de phyir yad //
translated: become the cause for both, therefore

original: sems can rnams ni bdag gi bla ma yin //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni bdag gi bla ma yin //
translated: sentient beings are my gurus.🔽Here, whatever suffering is experienced, such as killing, binding,

original: 'di nyid la ni gsod dang 'ching pa dang // rdeg dang sdig sogs sdug bsngal myong ba gang //
analyzed: 'di nyid la ni gsod dang 'ching pa dang // rdeg dang sdig sogs sdug bsngal myong ba gang //
translated: beating, and harming,

original: de ni sems can 'tshe ba'i 'bras bu zhes //
analyzed: de ni sems can 'tshe ba'i 'bras bu zhes //
translated: that is said to be the result of harming sentient beings

original: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bka' stsal to //
translated: by the Sugatas.

original: gzugs dang nad med dag gis gnod pa dang // phongs dang rigs ngan tshe ni thung ba dang // chung ma shi dang long bar gyur pa nyid //
analyzed: gzugs dang nad med dag gis gnod pa dang // phongs dang rigs ngan tshe ni thung ba dang // chung ma shi dang long bar gyur pa nyid //
translated: having a wife who dies, being blind,

original: sems can gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: sems can gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu yin //
translated: are the results of harming sentient beings.🔽The various sufferings experienced in the lower realms,

original: mnar med pa yi bar gyi ngan song gi / gnas su sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba gang //
analyzed: mnar med pa yi bar gyi ngan song gi / gnas su sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ba gang //
translated: up to the Avīci hell,🔽all of them

original: de dag thams cad rang nyid nyes pa yis //
analyzed: de dag thams cad rang nyid nyes pa yis //
translated: are due to one’s own faults.

original: sems can rnams la gnod ba byas pas yin //
analyzed: sems can rnams la gnod ba byas pas yin //
translated: They are the result of harming sentient beings.

original: gang zhig 'di nyid la ni mchod byas mchod //🔽grags dang yid 'ong nor rnams thob pa dag / yid 'ong yid du mi 'ong sems can la //
analyzed: gang zhig 'di nyid la ni mchod byas mchod // grags dang yid 'ong nor rnams thob pa dag / yid 'ong yid du mi 'ong sems can la //
translated: Those who are worshipped in this world🔽attain fame, pleasure, and wealth,

original: mngon par phan dang 'tshe ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: mngon par phan dang 'tshe ba'i sgo nas so //
translated: through the doors of benefiting and not harming sentient beings.

original: nad med pa dang rigs ni phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: nad med pa dang rigs ni phun sum tshogs //
translated: Good health, a perfect family,🔽a beautiful body, a long life, power,

original: gzugs mdzes pa dang tshe ring dbang phyug dang // nor la sogs dang chung ma sbas pa ni //
analyzed: gzugs mdzes pa dang tshe ring dbang phyug dang // nor la sogs dang chung ma sbas pa ni //
translated: wealth, and a hidden wife

original: sems can phan pa byed pa'i 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: sems can phan pa byed pa'i 'bras bu yin //
translated: are the results of benefiting sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams la dga' bar byed pa yis //
analyzed: sems can rnams la dga' bar byed pa yis //
translated: By delighting sentient beings,🔽one attains a kingdom, a great kingdom,

original: rgyal srid rgyal srid che dang yang dag gi / rgyal srid 'khor los sgyur ba mchog nyid dang // dbang po'i gnas ni 'thob par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rgyal srid rgyal srid che dang yang dag gi / rgyal srid 'khor los sgyur ba mchog nyid dang // dbang po'i gnas ni 'thob par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: the sovereignty of a universal monarch, and the state of an Indra.

original: skyes bu sems can phan par byed pa yis //
analyzed: skyes bu sems can phan par byed pa yis //
translated: By benefiting sentient beings,

original: sangs rgyas go 'phang yang ni thob 'gyur na //🔽gang zhig snying po med pa dman pa'i lha //
analyzed: sangs rgyas go 'phang yang ni thob 'gyur na // gang zhig snying po med pa dman pa'i lha //
translated: one attains the state of a Buddha.

original: thob pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod //
analyzed: thob pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod //
translated: What is so amazing about attaining🔽a lesser godhood that is devoid of essence?

original: gal te sems can de dag med gyur na //
analyzed: gal te sems can de dag med gyur na //
translated: If those sentient beings did not exist,

original: 'di ni gang gi ched du sbyin ba gtong //
analyzed: 'di ni gang gi ched du sbyin ba gtong //
translated: for whose sake would one practice generosity?

original: gal te @166a * //
analyzed: gal te @166a * //
translated: If those sentient beings did not exist,🔽for whose sake would one practice ethical discipline?

original: lus can rnams ni med gyur na //
analyzed: lus can rnams ni med gyur na //
translated: If those sentient beings did not exist,

original: gang las 'dul ba'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur //🔽nyes pa byed pa yang ni gang zhig yin //
analyzed: gang las 'dul ba'i tshul khrims thob par 'gyur // nyes pa byed pa yang ni gang zhig yin //
translated: from whom would one attain the ethical discipline of self-control?🔽If those sentient beings did not exist,🔽for whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?

original: gang gi ched du dpa' bo bzod pa sgom //🔽gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir //
analyzed: gang gi ched du dpa' bo bzod pa sgom // gang zhig mngon par 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir //
translated: For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?

original: su yi ched du brtson 'grus de de byed //
analyzed: su yi ched du brtson 'grus de de byed //
translated: For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience?🔽For whose sake would a hero cultivate patience

original: gal te lus can rnams ni med gyur na //🔽ji ltar byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms dag la yang dag brten nas ni //
analyzed: gal te lus can rnams ni med gyur na // ji ltar byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms dag la yang dag brten nas ni //
translated: If there were no embodied beings,🔽How could there be the attainment of the bliss of meditative concentration,

original: bsam gtan snyoms 'jug bde ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam gtan snyoms 'jug bde ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: Relying on love, compassion, joy, and equanimity?

original: thar pa'i bde ba dngos dang dngos med shes //
analyzed: thar pa'i bde ba dngos dang dngos med shes //
translated: Liberation is known as the bliss of the real and the unreal.

original: khams dang bsam pa bag la nyal du brjod //
analyzed: khams dang bsam pa bag la nyal du brjod //
translated: The elements, intentions, and latent tendencies🔽Are said to be the causes of affliction and purification.

original: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba dag / gal te de dag med na ji ltar shes //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba dag / gal te de dag med na ji ltar shes //
translated: If these did not exist, how could they be known?

original: byang chub phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi //
analyzed: byang chub phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams kyi //
translated: The causes of the factors of awakening

original: rgyu ni ji ltar sems can rnams yin la //
analyzed: rgyu ni ji ltar sems can rnams yin la //
translated: Are sentient beings.

original: de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa yis //
translated: Therefore, those who desire complete awakening

original: sems can rnams ni bla ma bzhin du lta //🔽de ltar 'byung po rnams ni bde chen gyi //
analyzed: sems can rnams ni bla ma bzhin du lta // de ltar 'byung po rnams ni bde chen gyi //
translated: Should regard sentient beings as their gurus.🔽Thus, when you make sentient beings

original: sgo ru sems bzhin par ni byed pa la //🔽'gro ba na ni dka' ba'i rnam pa ni //
analyzed: sgo ru sems bzhin par ni byed pa la // 'gro ba na ni dka' ba'i rnam pa ni //
translated: Your door to great bliss,🔽There is no hardship whatsoever

original: mi bzod gang yin de la cung zad med //
analyzed: mi bzod gang yin de la cung zad med //
translated: In the unbearable suffering of wandering in cyclic existence.

original: gang gi sems la sems can rnams //
analyzed: gang gi sems la sems can rnams //
translated: toward all sentient beings,

original: bdag nyid yin pa de ltar gnas //
analyzed: bdag nyid yin pa de ltar gnas //
translated: they are the ones who abide in this way.🔽They have no attachment to external things,

original: de la phyi rol dngos tshogs dang // chung ma dag kyang mngon zhen med ;
analyzed: de la phyi rol dngos tshogs dang // chung ma dag kyang mngon zhen med ;
translated: to their wives, or even to their own bodies.🔽They accept such harm

original: / bdag nyid dang ni pha ma dang // bu dang chung ma dag la yang //
analyzed: / bdag nyid dang ni pha ma dang // bu dang chung ma dag la yang //
translated: toward themselves, their parents, their children, and their wives,🔽but they do not harm sentient beings.

original: gnod pa de 'dra khas blang gi / sems can rnams la gnod mi bya //
analyzed: gnod pa de 'dra khas blang gi / sems can rnams la gnod mi bya //
translated: They are patient with sentient beings

original: nyes pa drag po byed pa yi //🔽sems can la bzod phan sems ldan //
analyzed: nyes pa drag po byed pa yi // sems can la bzod phan sems ldan //
translated: who commit violent acts out of a desire to help them.

original: sems can rnams la gus brtan pa //
analyzed: sems can rnams la gus brtan pa //
translated: They are steadfast in their respect for sentient beings

original: nyes pa chung du 'ang mi byed do //🔽'di dag nyid la phan 'dod pa'i //
analyzed: nyes pa chung du 'ang mi byed do // 'di dag nyid la phan 'dod pa'i //
translated: and do not commit even the slightest misdeed.🔽Those who don the armor of effort

original: brtson 'grus go cha gyon pa ni //🔽'bras bu che la bskal stong du //
analyzed: brtson 'grus go cha gyon pa ni // 'bras bu che la bskal stong du //
translated: in order to help them🔽are happy to remain for a thousand eons

original: dmyal ba'i mer yang gnas par spro //
analyzed: dmyal ba'i mer yang gnas par spro //
translated: in the fires of the hells for the sake of a great result.🔽They meditate on the gurus and the guru of gurus

original: bdag gi skye dang 'jig dang rtogs pa la //🔽ji lta ba dang ji snyed gnod pa yi //
analyzed: bdag gi skye dang 'jig dang rtogs pa la // ji lta ba dang ji snyed gnod pa yi //
translated: through the power of concentration🔽toward those sentient beings who are harmed

original: sems can de dag bsam gtan dbang gis ni //🔽bla ma dang ni bla mar rab tu sgom //
analyzed: sems can de dag bsam gtan dbang gis ni //🔽bla ma dang ni bla mar rab tu sgom //
translated: by the way things are and by the extent of things.

original: de ltar chos lnga po dag yod na ni //
analyzed: de ltar chos lnga po dag yod na ni //
translated: If these five dharmas are present,

original: legs skyes rtsa can byang chub sems dpa' ni //🔽'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis //
analyzed: legs skyes rtsa can byang chub sems dpa' ni // 'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa yis //
translated: the bodhisattva, the one of good birth,

original: nges par gang pa yin par brjod par bya //
analyzed: nges par gang pa yin par brjod par bya //
translated: is said to be filled with the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang zhig brten pas chen po nyid thob cing //
analyzed: gang zhig brten pas chen po nyid thob cing //
translated: By relying on them, he attains the state of greatness;

original: gnod pas dka' ba'i @166b log par ltung ba thob //
analyzed: gnod pas dka' ba'i @166b log par ltung ba thob //
translated: by harming them, he attains the downfall of the difficult to bear.

original: srog kyang yongs su btang bar byas nas kyang //
analyzed: srog kyang yongs su btang bar byas nas kyang //
translated: Even if he gives up his life,

original: de dag dga' bar byas pa nyid du rigs //🔽mang po gang dag brten pas grub pa ni //
analyzed: de dag dga' bar byas pa nyid du rigs // mang po gang dag brten pas grub pa ni //
translated: he should make them happy.🔽Those beings are the ones who attain

original: thob pa de ltar sems can de dag yin //🔽sems can de dag las ni zhing gzhan pa'i //
analyzed: thob pa de ltar sems can de dag yin // sems can de dag las ni zhing gzhan pa'i //
translated: the accomplishment that comes from relying on the many.🔽There is no field of accomplishment in other realms

original: grub pa'i zhing ni 'gro ba na yod min //
analyzed: grub pa'i zhing ni 'gro ba na yod min //
translated: that is equal to these beings.

original: 'di dag yid bzhin nor bu ste //
analyzed: 'di dag yid bzhin nor bu ste //
translated: They are wish-fulfilling gems,

original: bum pa bzang yin 'dod 'jo'i ba //
analyzed: bum pa bzang yin 'dod 'jo'i ba //
translated: excellent vases, and wish-granting cows.

original: de'i phyir lha dang bla ma bzhin //
analyzed: de'i phyir lha dang bla ma bzhin //
translated: Therefore, like gods and gurus,

original: de dag sten par byed pa yin //
analyzed: de dag sten par byed pa yin //
translated: I rely on them.

original: lung dang rigs pas yongs su bltas nas ni //
analyzed: lung dang rigs pas yongs su bltas nas ni //
translated: Having examined them with scripture and reasoning,

original: sems can kun gyi bdag gi snyam rlom pa'i //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi bdag gi snyam rlom pa'i //
translated: And think, “I am the self of all sentient beings.”🔽

original: dam pa'i lag tu dge legs thams cad ni //
analyzed: dam pa'i lag tu dge legs thams cad ni //
translated: In the hands of the holy, all good things

original: yun mi ring bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: yun mi ring bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //
translated: Will soon appear.

original: 'di ni thub pa chen po'i spyod pa ste //
analyzed: 'di ni thub pa chen po'i spyod pa ste //
translated: This is the practice of the great sages;

original: dpang bcas 'di la dpyad pa mi bya'o //
analyzed: dpang bcas 'di la dpyad pa mi bya'o //
translated: Do not dispute it with witnesses.

original: ji srid 'di ni mngon du ma byas pa //
analyzed: ji srid 'di ni mngon du ma byas pa //
translated: Until this is realized,

original: de srid grub pa srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de srid grub pa srid pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no possibility of accomplishment.

original: re zhig brtag par bya phyir ji skad du //
analyzed: re zhig brtag par bya phyir ji skad du //
translated: For the time being, in order to investigate,🔽Strive in this explanation,

original: bshad pa 'di la 'bad pa gyis shig dang // chen po nyid ni rgyu mtshan du gyur pa //
analyzed: bshad pa 'di la 'bad pa gyis shig dang // chen po nyid ni rgyu mtshan du gyur pa //
translated: And the greatness itself will become the reason;

original: yon tan rang nyid kyis ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan rang nyid kyis ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: You will attain the qualities by yourself.

original: 'di ni chen po nyid kyi lam //
analyzed: 'di ni chen po nyid kyi lam //
translated: This is the path of greatness;

original: rigs ni sems can chen pos bsten //
analyzed: rigs ni sems can chen pos bsten //
translated: The family is served by great beings.🔽This holy wish-fulfilling gem

original: sems can kun la bde ster ba'i //🔽'phags 'di yid bzhin nor bu yin //
analyzed: sems can kun la bde ster ba'i // 'phags 'di yid bzhin nor bu yin //
translated: Bestows happiness on all beings.

original: rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu'i gtam slob dpon 'phags ba klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rmi lam yid bzhin nor bu'i gtam slob dpon 'phags ba klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Story of the Wish-Fulfilling Gem in a Dream, composed by Ārya Nāgārjuna, is complete.

original: // / kha che'i pandi ta shr'i ra tha dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur//
analyzed: // / kha che'i pandi ta shr'i ra tha dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong grags 'byor shes rab kyis bsgyur//
translated: The Kashmiri paṇḍita Śrīratna and the translator, the monk Lotsāwa Drakpa Özer Sherap, translated it.
